name: Purple AK-47
description: This slightly indica-dominant hybrid knocks out pain in a hurry. The product of a cross between Granddaddy Purple and AK-47, Purple AK-47 provides consumers with a relaxing, tingly body sensation. The gentle body feeling is coupled with a rush of mental energy, making this a balanced hybrid. Drawing from its AK-47 heritage, this strain is a fast-acting “one hit wonder.” It has a very pungent yet floral aroma and features a flowering time of 7-9 weeks. If you suffer from pain and need to get things done, Purple AK-47 might be a good one to try.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Focused, Euphoric, Aroused, Sleepy, Pain, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Headache, Dizzy, Paranoid
